name: Go Go I-Land
overview: GoGo I-Land is a romantic adventure released by Kid in the year 2000 for the Playstation One (the game was also released for PC) console. In the game the player takes the role of a manager of a company that one day is called by the president of his company telling him that he only got 3 weeks to find a new talented girl for their new production. So he goes to the actors school that is on an island and sneak them as a novice. During the time that he will be on the island he will meet different talented girls (they got different talents in acting, singing or modeling), the island is deserted, since there are only the actors school teachers and the students. Since the player arrives to the island the gameplay is the classic first person adventure since the player can only choose between different answers to advance the adventure in a way or another and during each day he can choose what he's going to do that day (dancing lessons, singing, acting, piano, etc.).
